div.p: THE DISCOVERY: OR, The SQUIRE turn'd FERRET.
To the TUNE of High Boys! up go we; Chevy Chase; Or what you please.

q.l: Heu me! per Urbem (nam pudet tanti mali)

div.p: WESTMINSTER: Printed by A. CAMPBELL, near New Palace-Yard; for T. WARNER, at the Black-Boy in Pater-noster-Row, and Sold by the Booksellers. 1727. [Price 6d.]

figure.p:
Cunicularii or The Wise men of Godliman in Consultation
They held their Talents most adrait
For any Mystical Exploit

list.item: A The Danceing Master or Praeternatural Anatomist.
B An Occult Philosopher searching into the Depth of things.
D The Guilford Rabbet Man Midwife.
F The Lady in the ftran.
G The Nurse or Rabbet Dresser.

body.head: THE DISCOVERY: OR, The SQUIRE turn'd FERRET.
An Excellent New BALLAD.
body.opener: To the TUNE of High Boys! up go we; Chevy Chase; Or what you please.

lg.head: I.
lg.l: MOST true it is, I dare to say,
E'er since the Days of Eve,
The weakest Woman sometimes may
The wisest Man deceive.

lg.head: II.
lg.l: For D blank nt circumspect, sedate,
A Machiavel by Trade,
Arriv'd Express, with News of Weight,
And thus, at Court, he said.

lg.head: III.
lg.l: At Godliman, hard by the Bull,
A Woman, long thought barren,
Bears Rabbits,—Gad! so plentiful,
You'd take her for a Warren.

lg.head: IV.
lg.l: These Eyes, quoth He, beheld them clear:
What, do ye doubt my View?
Behold this Narrative that's here;
Why, Zounds! and Blood! 'tis true.

lg.head: V.
lg.l: Some said that D blank gl blank s sent should be,
Some talk'd of W blank lk blank r's Merit,
But most held, in this Midwifery,
No Doctor like a FERRET.

lg.head: VI.
lg.l: But M blank l blank n blank x, who heard this told,
(Right wary He and wise)
Cry'd sagely, 'Tis not safe, I hold,
To trust to D blank nt's Eyes.

lg.head: VII.
lg.l: A Vow to God He then did make
He would himself go down,
St. A blank d blank re too, the Scale to take
Of that Phoenomenon.

lg.head: VIII.
lg.l: He order'd then his Coach and Four;
(The Coach was quickly got 'em)
Resolv'd this Secret to explore,
And search it to the Bottom.

lg.head: IX.
lg.l: At Godliman they now arrive,
For Haste they made exceeding;
As Courtiers should, whene'er they strive
To be inform'd of Breeding.

lg.head: X.
lg.l: The good Wife to the Surgeon sent,
And said to him, Good Neighbour,
'Tis pity that two Suqires so Gent—
should come and lose their Labour.

lg.head: XI.
lg.l: The Surgeon with a Rabbit came,
But first in Pieces cut it;
Then slyly thrust it up that same,
As far as Man could put it.

lg.head: XII.
lg.l: (Ye Guildford Inn-keepers take heed
You dress not such a Rabbit,
Ye Poult'rers eke, destroy the Breed,
'Tis so unsav'ry a-Bit.)

lg.head: XIII.
lg.l: But hold! says Molly, first let's try,
Now that her Legs are ope,
If ought within we may descry
By Help of Telescope.

lg.head: XIV.
lg.l: The Instrument himself did make,
He rais'd and level'd right,
But all about was so opake,
It could not aid his Sight.

lg.head: XV.
lg.l: On Tiptoe then the Squire he stood,
(But first He gave Her Money)
Then reach'd as high as e'er He cou'd,
And cry'd, I feel a CONY.

lg.head: XVI.
lg.l: Is it alive? St. A blank d blank re cry'd;
It is; I feel it stir.
Is it full grown? the Squire reply'd;
It is; see here's the FUR.

lg.head: XVII.
lg.l: And now two Legs St. A blank d blank re got,
And then came two Legs more;
Now fell the Head to Molly's Lot,
And so the Work was o'er.

lg.head: XVIII.
lg.l: The Woman, thus being brought to Bed,
Said, to reward your Pains,
St. A blank nd blank re shall dissect the Head,
And thou shalt have the Brains.

lg.head: XIX.
lg.l: He lap'd it in a Linnen Rag,
Then thank'd Her for Her Kindness;
And cram'd it in the Velvet Bag
That serves his R blank l H blank

lg.head: XX.
lg.l: That Bag—which Jenny, wanton Slut,
First brought to foul Disgrace;
Stealing the Papers thence she put
Veal-Cutlets in their Place.

lg.head: XXI.
lg.l: O! happy would it be, I ween,
Could they these Rabbits smother;
Molly had ne'er a Midwife been,
Nor she a shameful Mother.

lg.head: XXII.
lg.l: Why has the Proverb falsly said
Could Molly hide this Rabbit's Head,
He still might shew his own.
